siteDescription: Experience the Mediterranean in unparalleled luxury. Bespoke yacht charters with personalized service, curated itineraries, and access to the finest vessels.

heroImage.alt: Santorini sunset with white buildings and blue domes

children.text: The Greek Islands offer an unparalleled yachting experience, combining ancient history, stunning natural beauty, and legendary hospitality.
Day 1-2: Athens & Saronic Gulf
Begin in Athens, then cruise to Hydra or Poros.
Croatia's Dalmatian coast offers a perfect blend of history, natural beauty, and Mediterranean charm.
The Amalfi Coast is Italy's most glamorous stretch of coastline, offering dramatic scenery and dolce vita lifestyle.
The French Riviera epitomizes Mediterranean glamour, from St. Tropez to Monaco.
Turkey's Turquoise Coast offers pristine waters, ancient ruins, and authentic culture.

heroSubtitle: Your trusted partner for unforgettable Mediterranean yacht experiences.

children.text: Founded in 2009, Mediterana Yachting was born from a simple belief: that a yacht charter should be more than a vacation — it should be a transformative experience.
What began as a small family operation has grown into one of the Mediterranean's most respected charter specialists, yet we've never lost the personal touch that defined our earliest days.

Today, we work with a carefully curated fleet of motor yachts, sailing vessels, and catamarans, each selected for its exceptional quality, professional crew, and ability to deliver the experiences our clients dream of.

valuesSubtitle: Our values guide every charter we plan and every relationship we build.

values.title: Expertise
values.description: Deep knowledge of Mediterranean waters, vessels, and what makes a charter exceptional.

values.title: Personal Touch
values.description: Every client is unique. We listen, understand, and deliver experiences tailored to you.

values.title: Excellence
values.description: We partner only with vessels and crews that meet our exacting standards.

values.title: Local Knowledge
values.description: Insider access to hidden gems, the best anchorages, and exclusive experiences.

processSubtitle: From your first inquiry to your last sunset at sea, we're with you every step of the way.

processSteps.title: Initial Consultation
processSteps.description: Share your vision with us. We'll discuss dates, destinations, group size, preferences, and any special occasions or requirements.

processSteps.title: Tailored Proposals
processSteps.description: We present a curated selection of yachts and itineraries matched to your needs, complete with detailed information and transparent pricing.

processSteps.title: Fine-Tuning
processSteps.description: Once you've chosen your yacht, we work together to perfect every detail — from provisioning to shore excursions to special requests.

processSteps.title: Seamless Embarkation
processSteps.description: We coordinate transfers, brief you on everything you need to know, and introduce you to your captain and crew.

processSteps.title: Ongoing Support
processSteps.description: Throughout your charter, we're available around the clock to assist with anything you need.

teamSubtitle: Passionate professionals dedicated to making your charter dreams come true.
ctaSubtitle: Our team is ready to help you discover the Mediterranean in style.
seoDescription: Learn about Mediterana Yachting - your trusted partner for luxury yacht charters in the Mediterranean.

heroSubtitle: Ready to start planning your Mediterranean adventure? We'd love to hear from you.
contactDescription: Reach out directly or fill in the form and we'll get back to you within 24 hours.
timezone: All times are in Eastern European Time (EET/EEST)
formDescription: Tell us about your dream charter and we'll create a personalized proposal.
faqDescription: New to yacht chartering? Check out our FAQ for answers to common questions about the process, costs, and what to expect.

faqs.question: When should I book?
faqs.answer: For peak season (July-August), we recommend booking 6-12 months in advance. Shoulder seasons offer more flexibility.

faqs.question: What's included in the price?
faqs.answer: Typically the yacht, crew, insurance, and standard equipment. Food, fuel, and docking fees are usually extra.

faqs.question: Do I need sailing experience?
faqs.answer: Not at all! Our crewed charters include professional captains and crew who handle everything.

seoDescription: Get in touch with Mediterana Yachting to start planning your luxury Mediterranean yacht charter.
